name: DailyPSA
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Looking for a bit of nostalgia to break up your daily news and weather? Then add Daily PSA! to your Flash Briefing and be informed!

Daily PSA! plays a random vintage Public Service Announcement straight from the golden era of radio and transports you right back to the 1940's and 50's.

Have fun and prepare to be informed! Thank you, fellow citizen.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
